name: Your Own Worst Enemy
description:
This game is still a very early prototype and there's not much in it yet, I hope to keep working on the game over the following weeks though, so stay tuned!

You can follow the development on the projects Github repo:
https://github.com/MichaelRRyan/Your-Own-Worst-Enemy

The Plan
While the game is pretty lacking at the moment, I have lot of ideas on where to go with the game. At present, my plan for the game is as follows:

The game will be a puzzle-platformer where opposed to just plainly dying, a the character is turned into a zombie, before being respawned, meaning you have an extra enemy to get past.

While the zombies do pose a threat to the player, you can use the zombies to solve puzzles, as they do nothing but blindly follow the player.

With the advancement of levels, the puzzles will get more and more complex, and introduce many more interesting and fun mechanics!
